members.joinCircumstances: Captain and founder of the Krieg Pirates.
Serves as Krieg's Combat Commander and second-in-command.

keyMoments.title: Gin Defies Krieg to Save Luffy
keyMoments.description: Gin, Krieg's Combat Commander, defies his captain by saving Luffy from the MH5 poison gas, showing a fracture in the crew's loyalty.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Krieg's ruthless leadership and willingness to harm his own crew members causes cracks in crew loyalty.

keyMoments.title: Krieg Deploys Ultimate Weapon
keyMoments.description: Don Krieg reveals his ultimate weapon, the Daisenso, in his battle against Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the full extent of Krieg's arsenal and his philosophy of overwhelming firepower.

ships.description: Krieg's flagship was destroyed before arriving at the Baratie.

jollyRoger.description: An hourglass symbol representing Krieg's fleet
